short_summary: Dental X Ray Equipment and Software
description: Tender for the upgrade and replacement of dental X-ray software and some equipment.
full_summary:
Dental X-Ray Equipment and Software #WS3750959165-Doc3761350564
=====================================================

**Record Information:**

* Reference Number: WS3750959165-Doc3761350564
* Solicitation Number: WS3750959165
* Publication Date: November 22, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: January 4, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* Amendment Number: 2
* Amendment Date: December 8, 2022

**Pre-Qualification Information:**

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Regions of Delivery: New Brunswick, Nova Scotia
* End User Entity: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)

**Commercial Details:**

* UN/SPSC Code: 42150000
* Description: Dental equipment and supplies
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and others

**Notice and Attachment Information:**

* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Tender Status: Expired
* Attachment: No attachments are available for this solicitation.

**Contract Details:**

* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2023
* Regions of Opportunity: None

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Kristelle LeBlanc
* Email: [kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: None
* Fax: None

**Description:**

The Correctional Service Canada has a requirement to upgrade and replace dental X-ray software and some equipment. Please disregard the initial Ariba Discovery posting and Buyandsell posting and submit your bid on January 4, 2023, by 2:00 PM EST. Any bids submitted after 2:00 PM EST will be deemed non-responsive. Please refer to the solicitation for additional information and requirements. [1](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14707093?extsite=MTQ3MDcwOTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) [2](https://www.buyandsell.gc.ca/stretchr)
